content: Oh, it's just a mosquito bite.
I forgot to use it today.
Not really, but it's a bit itchy now.
No, it's okay. I already put some antiseptic cream on it.
I don't want it to get infected. Remember that time I got bitten and the bite swelled up?
Exactly, I don't want to go through that again.
Yes, prevention is always better than cure.
I don't know, I came back and found my things like this.
I have no idea.
Not yet, I am still too shocked.
I know, but what if they can't do anything about it?
I just can't believe it. My favorite books, my clothes, my jewelry, all ruined.
Just hold me. This is so devastating.
It feels like we've been through so much together.
Remember when we talked about you wanting a new Porsche?
It's just stuff though, we should focus on what's really important.
Yes, like our love for each other.
I just hope whoever did this is caught soon.
Another car? How much is that going to cost us?
I don't understand why you need a new car when the one you have now works just fine.
Is that what this is about? You wanting to look good?
I understand that you've worked hard for your money, but maybe there are other things we could spend it on that would benefit us as a family.
Maybe a family vacation or investing in our children's education.
I don't know, I just think we need to prioritize our spending and make sure we're making wise choices for our future.
I appreciate that. I just want to make sure we're being responsible with our money.
That's because being close to someone isn't about material possessions. It's about the connection between two people.
And you're always there for me too, even when I don't understand why you want a new car.
Yes we are. And I think we make wise decisions together for the good of our family.
Yes, dear?
Aww, that's sweet. I like when you call me that too.
I know what you mean. It's like our own little thing.
Oh yeah, I remember. You put some antiseptic cream on it for me.
Definitely. It's those little acts of kindness that really make a relationship strong.
And you do a great job at it. I feel so lucky to have you as my partner in life.
What? Why were you hiding in the bushes?
You can't just spy on our son like that. It's not healthy for our relationship with him.
I understand that, but you need to find other ways to show him that you care. Like spending time with him or talking to him about his day.
Yes, I remember.
That's very mature of you. I'm glad you're thinking about our family's needs before your own wants.
And that's why I love you.
